description: Smallest number with same number of divisors as n!.
example: 8!=40320 has 96 divisors, but 27720 is smaller with also 96 divisors. 9!=362880 has 160 divisors, but 166320 is smaller.
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {nd = numdiv(n!); k = 1; while(numdiv(k) != nd, k++); k;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Aug 28 2013
author: _Donald S. McDonald_, Mar 20 1999
